titles: The humble addresse both of church and poore, to the sacred maiestie of Great Britaines monarch For a just redresse of the uniting of churches, and the ruine of hospitalls. By William Guild, minister of Aberdene.
author: Guild, William, 1586-1657.
Guild, William, 1586-1657. Issachars asse, braying under a double burden. Selections. aut
notes: The first part contains excerpts from "Issachars asse, braying under a double burden"; B1-3 are the original leaves from STC 12482.
Part 2 has caption title, reading: The poores complaynt.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Church of Scotland --  Government --  Early works to 1800.
